mapper.select: SELECT left(sido_code,2) as sidoCode, sido_name as sidoName FROM sidocode ORDER BY sido_code
SELECT left(gugun_code,5) gugunCode, gugun_name as gugunName FROM guguncode where left(gugun_code,2) = #{value} ORDER BY gugun_code
SELECT dong as dongName, dongcode as dongCode FROM dongcode where left(dongcode,5) = #{value} ORDER BY dong
SELECT no,dong,AptName as aptName,code,jibun FROM houseinfo WHERE dong = #{value} ORDER BY AptName
SELECT no,dong,AptName as aptName,code,jibun FROM houseinfo WHERE AptName like CONCAT('%',#{value},'%') ORDER BY AptName
SELECT no,dong,AptName as aptName,code,dealAmount FROM housedeal WHERE AptName= #{aptName} and dong=#{dong} ORDER BY dealAmount
